posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:TTT moderater
2) Your age: (You can disclose this information to us privately if you wish) 14
3) Your location: (Country, timezone) U.S.A. Pacific standard time
4) Current In-Game Name: 4²°мAf¡å™|Sfc.James
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: http://steamcommunity.com/id/James27049
6) How did you find out about NNJG: I was looking for a good ttt server.
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers: 1-2 months before apps closed
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/Other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, etc.) Moderation.
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: I want to help moderate and keep out rdmers, so i stop them now before they ruin the fun of the game. 
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for: Yes i was  super admin o a ttt and rp server. I was also admin on mny css servrs.
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it:Yes, I have started using my mic more frequently since i started my youtube videos.
12) Any other comments or information you can provide: I really hope my application is accepted.
